ing: 1 clove clove of garlic, minced, or to taste
des: "A very tasty and simple mango salsa.  It can also be used over chicken, with fajitas, or with quesadillas. I chop up the ingredients in my food processor to save time."
ins: Stir the mangos, green onions, garlic, cilantro, lime juice, and orange juice together in a bowl. Chill at least 1 hour before serving.
